My Projects

Displaying some personal/school -projects I've been working on during the years. Check them out!



2025 - More projects to be added!
Since the last time updating this website (2023) I've been working on a lot of projects. Here's a list of some of them, I'm willing to share them upon request!

Design for social change: a social design project solving issues in rural childcare in Scotland.

User experience design: Designing a better user experience for adults in paloheina sledding hill.

Smart wearables: Creating a prototype of "smart socks" that analyze the users gate and walking patterns.

User interfaces: Creating a prototype for a receipt scanning/bill-splitting app, exploring the possibilities for AI. Link for demo Figma project: Creating a one-for-one duplicate of the "Aalto Spaces - App"
